mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM document d JOIN employee e ON d.doc_writer_no = e.emp_no WHERE d.doc_type = 'V' AND d.approval_status = 'A' AND (#{empNo} IS NULL OR e.emp_no = #{empNo});

SELECT e.emp_no AS empNo, e.emp_name AS empName, vr.total_vacation AS total_vacation_days, SUM(CASE WHEN d.vacation_type = 'AL' THEN 1 WHEN d.vacation_type IN ('HLA', 'HLP') THEN 0.5 ELSE 0 END) AS used_vacation_days, (vr.total_vacation - SUM(CASE WHEN d.vacation_type = 'AL' THEN 1 WHEN d.vacation_type IN ('HLA', 'HLP') THEN 0.5 ELSE 0 END)) AS remaining_vacation_days FROM employee e JOIN vacation_record vr ON e.emp_no = vr.emp_no LEFT JOIN document d ON e.emp_no = d.doc_writer_no AND d.doc_type = 'V' AND d.approval_status = 'A' GROUP BY e.emp_no, e.emp_name, vr.total_vacation;

SELECT e.emp_no AS empNo, e.emp_name AS empName, d.doc_title AS docTitle, d.start_date AS startDate, d.end_date AS endDate, d.vacation_type AS vacationType, CASE WHEN d.vacation_type = 'AL' THEN 1 WHEN d.vacation_type IN ('HLA', 'HLP') THEN 0.5 ELSE 0 END AS vacationDays FROM document d JOIN employee e ON d.doc_writer_no = e.emp_no WHERE d.doc_type = 'V' AND d.approval_status = 'A' AND e.emp_no = #{empNo} ORDER BY e.emp_no, d.start_date LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
